data.title: County Hall of Fame to induct Bryan brothers
data.meta_description: The Ventura County Sports Hall of Fame will honor its 2014 inductees at 6 p.m. Sun., June 8 at the Ventura Beach Marriott Hotel, 2055 Harbor Blvd., Ventura. data.text:
The Ventura County Sports Hall of Fame will honor its 2014 inductees at 6 p.m. Sun., June 8 at the Ventura Beach Marriott Hotel, 2055 Harbor Blvd., Ventura.

The five inductees are 15-time Grand Slam tennis champions and Olympic gold medalists Mike and Bob Bryan; California Lutheran University Hall of Fame basketball player Carl Bowman; Steve Blum, retired Buena High School cross country coach and masters national champion distant runner; and former seven-time Channel League champion football coach Rick Scott, also of Buena High.

The program will also honor the outstanding male and female scholar-athletes of the high schools and colleges in Ventura County.

In addition, winners of the Hall of Fame scholarships and the Suzanne Manlet Foundation scholarship will be presented.

Tickets for the awards dinner are $50.
